title: DIE BRAUT - Die Braut-Demo CDM (2007)
description:
DIE BRAUT - Die Braut-Demo CDM (2007)

Country: Chile
Label: Danse Macabre / Biohazzard (Just signed)
MYSPACE: diebrautproject 

DIE BRAUT (Unsehbar Album out in July 25th, 2008)

Genre: Industrial, EBM, Dark Electro, Aggrotech

Band Members Katia Figueroa "Braut" :Voices, sampling, lyrics & artwork
Cristian Soto Vanelli :Production, arrangements, mixing, mastering and remixing
 
Influences Electro, industrial, Ebm, noise & gothic Music

Tracklist:
01- Hure (Puta Madre Mix)
02- Madchen und Kriege
03- Mutter Biete
04- Verbrechen

If you like Proyecto Crisis, Deadjump, or Hocico - you gonna LUV DIE BRAUT!!! :)
